title: Left and Right
goal: Learn lateral positions and full spatial descriptions.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Position review:

gapru = ?     cnita = ?
crane = ?     trixe = ?

(Answers: above, below, in front, behind)

New Material (5-7 min)

New Vocabulary

Lojban Place Structure English
zunle x1 is to the left of x2 left
pritu x1 is to the right of x2 right

Using Left and Right

lo mlatu cu zunle lo gerku

The cat is to the left of the dog.

la .alis. cu pritu la .bob.

Alice is to the right of Bob.

All 8 Spatial Positions

Lojban English
nenri inside
bartu outside
gapru above
cnita below
crane in front
trixe behind
zunle left
pritu right

Full Spatial Description

lo mlatu cu zunle vi lo jubme
.i lo gerku cu pritu va lo sfofa
.i lo cipni cu gapru vu

The cat is to the left of the table, here. The dog is to the right of the sofa, there. The bird is above, far away.

Key Point

Combine position + distance + reference object for precise spatial description.
sections.title: New Material (5-7 min)

sections.content:
Practice (4-5 min)

Exercise 1: Use zunle/pritu

Translate:

  1. The cat is to the left of the dog.
  2. I am to the right of Alice.
  3. The book is to the left.
Answers
  1. lo mlatu cu zunle lo gerku
  2. mi pritu la .alis.
  3. lo cukta cu zunle

Exercise 2: Describe a Room

Translate:

  1. The table is in the middle. The chair is to the left.
  2. The door is in front. The window is behind.
  3. The lamp is above the table.
Answers
  1. lo jubme cu midju .i lo stizu cu zunle
  2. lo vorme cu crane .i lo canko cu trixe
  3. lo djacla cu gapru lo jubme

Exercise 3: Full Description

Describe in Lojban:

  1. The cat is inside the box. The dog is outside, to the right.
  2. The bird is above and in front.
Answers
  1. lo mlatu cu nenri lo tanxe .i lo gerku cu bartu gi'e pritu
  2. lo cipni cu gapru gi'e crane

items.text: The cat is to the left of the dog.
I am to the right of Alice.
The book is to the left.
The table is in the middle. The chair is to the left.
items.answer: `lo jubme cu midju .i lo stizu cu zunle`

items.text: The door is in front. The window is behind.
items.answer: `lo vorme cu crane .i lo canko cu trixe`

items.text: The lamp is above the table.
The cat is inside the box. The dog is outside, to the right.
items.answer: `lo mlatu cu nenri lo tanxe .i lo gerku cu bartu gi'e pritu`

items.text: The bird is above and in front.

sections.content:
Conversation Challenge (1-2 min)

Describe your room aloud:

Use at least 4 position words.

Example:

lo jubme cu vi zvati
.i lo stizu cu zunle lo jubme
.i lo cukta cu gapru lo jubme
.i lo vorme cu crane

Today's Vocab

Lojban English
zunle to the left of
pritu to the right of

Summary

You learned zunle (left) and pritu (right). You now have 8 spatial position words for complete spatial descriptions.

Tomorrow preview: Compound tenses — puca'o, baco'a, puze'a.
